group_id.description: The ID of the group to which the organization belongs

created_at.description: The date and time when the organization was created

tags.description: List of tags associated with the organization

shared_tickets.description: Indicates if tickets are shared with this organization

organization_fields.description: Custom fields associated with the organization

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the organization

domain_names.description: List of domain names associated with the organization

shared_comments.description: Indicates if comments are shared with this organization

updated_at.description: The date and time when the organization was last updated

external_id.description: The external ID of the organization

id.description: The unique ID of the organization

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the organization was deleted
